name: inferno
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.
